articles.title: 5 little-known but must-try mushrooms from China full of health benefits - AsiaOne
articles.description: With health benefits ranging from antioxidants to natural antidepressants, these mushrooms – ganba, horn of plenty, monkey head, beefsteak and indigo milk cap – are worth seeking out.
